articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — As the coronavirus epidemic worsens, U.S. health experts hope Joe Biden's administration will put in place something Donald Trump's has not — a comprehensive national testing...
articles.content:
NEW YORK (AP) As the coronavirus epidemic worsens, U.S. health experts hope Joe Bidens administration will put in place something Donald Trumps has not a comprehensive national testing strategy.
